perturbation.original_text: Amounts not received within ten (10) days following their respective due dates shall be assessed a late charge equal to one and one-half percent (1 _%) per month of the overdue amount until paid, commencing on the eleventh day.
perturbation.changed_text: Amounts not received within ten (10) days following their respective due dates shall be assessed a late charge equal to one and one-half percent (1 _%) per month of the overdue amount until paid, commencing on the eleventh day. However, no late charges will be applied until 45 days past the due date.
perturbation.explanation: This creates a contradiction by stating late charges begin after 10 days, then later implying they don't apply until 45 days. This introduces uncertainty regarding when late fees are actually applied, potentially leading to disputes.

perturbation.original_text: Company shall deliver to North, at no charge, and in a timely fashion, a reasonable number of Endorsed Products for North’s personal use each Contract Year during the Contract Period. All postage expenses associated with the delivery of the Endorsed Products shall be borne by Company.
perturbation.changed_text: Company shall deliver to North, at no charge, and in a timely fashion, a reasonable number of Endorsed Products for North’s personal use each Contract Year during the Contract Period. All postage expenses associated with the delivery of the Endorsed Products shall be borne by Company. However, North is responsible for the shipping fees up to $100 per year.
perturbation.explanation: This creates a contradiction by stating the company bears all postage expenses, and then stating the North is responsible for shipping fees up to $100 per year. It introduces uncertainty regarding who is responsible for shipping fees.

perturbation.original_text: North agrees that any Advertising Materials submitted for approval as provided herein may be deemed by Company to have been approved hereunder if the same is not disapproved by North within seven (7) business days after receipt thereof.
perturbation.changed_text: North agrees that any Advertising Materials submitted for approval as provided herein may be deemed by Company to have been approved hereunder if the same is not disapproved by North within seven (7) business days after receipt thereof. However, no advertising material is deemed approved without explicit written consent from North.
perturbation.explanation: This introduces a contradiction by stating materials are 'deemed' approved after 7 days of no disapproval, but also states that nothing is approved without explicit written consent. This introduces ambiguity.
